title: sEvittAl sheida
sahitya:
sEvittAl sheida pAvam pOghumE sEvark-koDiyOnadu sEvaDi tanaiyE


anupallavi

  Avi kuzhaiyumAru avan arum pugazhinai nAvinakkap-pADi nALtOrum ini


caraNam    dEvar tAmizhaitta tIvinaip-payanAga mAvara sUranin Evalukk_ALAgi
kEvalamura avar kAvaLanAi mEvina pAvana bhakta prEma bAlasubramaNyanai
